title: The Reaper Society Omnibus: Volume 1
description: The Reapers are by definition a race of Guardians. A gift from the Creator to the Human race with a preternaturally strong human body and an eternal soul. They come from all walks of life and from every time period in history, existing only to keep the balance between the living and the dead. To stand as bastion between the humans and the world of the supernatural.Sometimes the monsters are real and sometimes, theyâ€™re right in front of you.Follow the Reapers as they stumble their way around rules that have been set long before they were created. Lives hang in the balance as they fight to keep the scales of Death in check.This book contains all four short stories/novellas in the Reaper Society series to date. Included are four never before seen bonus short stories and a preview of the next book in the series.
author: Francesca Vance
